Home.heroTitle: Connecting Chinese Culture with the UofT Community
Home.heroSubtitle: Building bridges, fostering growth, and creating a home away from home for students.
Home.guideDescription: Get your copy of the 2024 Freshman Guide. It's your essential survival manual covering everything from course selection and housing to the best food spots in Toronto.
Home.internalDesc: The backbone of our operations. Managing activities, human resources, and logistics to keep the organization running smoothly.
Home.externalDesc: Building bridges. Responsible for public relations, sponsorships, and organizing major external events like the Spring Gala.
Home.executiveDesc: The creative engine. Handling finance, marketing, and media production to amplify our voice and ensure sustainability.

About.title: About Us
About.subtitle: Serving the Chinese community at UofT since 1982.
About.missionText: To build a home away from home for Chinese students and scholars at the University of Toronto. We strive to foster a supportive community, promote Chinese culture, and bridge the gap between students and the broader university environment.
About.historyText: Founded in 1982, UT CSSA has grown from a small student group to one of the largest and most influential student organizations at the University of Toronto. For over four decades, we have been dedicated to serving the Chinese community and promoting cultural exchange.
About.internalDesc: The 'shopkeepers' of our family. Includes Activity, HR, and Logistics departments. We maintain the daily operations and ensure everything runs smoothly.
About.externalDesc: The bridge to the outside world. Includes Sponsorship and Public Relations. We organize major events like the Spring Gala and build professional networks.
About.executiveDesc: The creative and technical hub. Includes Finance, Marketing, and Media. We manage the organization's 'lifeline' and amplify our voice through design and content.
About.generalDesc: Supporting student life and academic success. We are dedicated to creating a supportive environment for all members.

Guides.title: Freshman Guides
Guides.description: For years, CSSA has dedicated itself to compiling the most comprehensive survival guide for new students. From course selection to finding the best food in Toronto, our Freshman Guide is your essential companion for starting your journey at UofT.
Guides.noGuides: No guides available at the moment. Please check back later.

Join.title: Become a Member
Join.description: Join the largest Chinese student community at the University of Toronto. Connect with peers, access exclusive resources, and make lifelong memories.
Join.note: You will be taken to our official registration page.
Join.communityDesc: Be part of a vibrant network of students. Find mentorship, study buddies, and friends for life.
Join.supportDesc: Get help with academic challenges, career planning, and adapting to life in Toronto.
Join.eventsDesc: Priority access to our most popular events, workshops, and galas throughout the year.
